extendedInfo.description: Make someone's day with a Zero Calorie Cupcake.  Have fun designing your own in seconds!Then add a greeting and send it via text message, e-mail, or facebook.  Great for special occasions, evites, or just to say "hi."With over 12,000 style combinations and thousands of colors, there are a million different ways to put a smile on someone's face.Great fun for all ages!SUPPORTS:SMS/MMSText MessagingGmailEmailFacebookMyspaceFlickrPicasaTAGS:  Cards, Greeting Cards, Ecard, E-card, Evite, E-vite, Holiday, Photo sharing, Valentine's Day, St. Patricks Day, St. Patrick's Day, Saint Patricks Day, 4th of July, Halloween, Thanksgiving, Christmas, New Years, Birthday, Anniversary.

reviews.title: Was cute. Now useless
reviews.comment: I know it\'s free, but I thought it was cute until it worked, ONCE, now it just says stopped working. Useless
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: App
reviews.comment: Is cute and easy to use.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awful
reviews.comment: Installed it, tried using it three times and it shut down on it\'s own everytime. :(
reviews.author: Dawn Wooldridge
